header.title: Stargate Portal Language update script 0.4.1, 0.4.2 to RC1.0.0
header.description: This file will assist in updating your language files
header.author-notes: Not test yet! Please report problems to: http://www.stargate-portal.com

edit.find:

edit.comment: If in doubt you can replace all the portal vars with the 'Replace With row'.
If the edit exists just ignore this edit.

edit.action: 'NO_EDIT' => 'Can\'t Edit', 'NO_DELETE' => 'Can\'t Delete', 'NO_MOVE_DOWN' => 'Can\'t move down', 'NO_MOVE_UP' => 'Can\'t move up', 'NO_RESYNC' => 'Resynchronise Disabled',
